import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./Home.css"; import axios from "axios"; import { apiUrl } from "../axios"; import ListMedicines from "./ListMedicines"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Home() { const [searchData, setSearchData] = useState({}); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { getCategories(); }, []); const search = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setSearchData(formValues); }; const onChangeHandler = (e) => { setFormValues({ ...formValues, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const getCategories = async () => { await axios .get(`${apiUrl}/medicine/categories`) .then((response) => { if (response.status === 200) { setCategories(response.data); } }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error); }); }; return (
